declarationSection.title: Confirm details and send your return

fields.infoText:
# Declaration 
By submitting this return, you declare that the information that you have provided is true and complete.

Send your return and payment by the due date to avoid financial penalties. 

If you give incomplete or inaccurate information, we may charge a financial penalty or even prosecute you.

fields.label: Payment
fields.infoText:
Make a payment

If you have already set up a Direct Debit for this tax, you don't need to do anything else. Your payment will be collected automatically from your bank.

You can also use BACS, CHAPS or Faster Payments to pay. Make sure to include your 15 digit registration number on any payment.

Account details:

Account name: HMRC Aggregates Levy

Account number:11963171

Sort code: 08 32 00

Payment reference: Include your 15 digit registration number
